attributes.action: change Tessa Jowell's title from Secretary of State for Culture, Media and Sport to Secretary of State for Drinking and Gambling
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It seems that Ms Jowell's efforts to increase the cultural life of the nation are limited to 24 hour drinking and gambling. If this is the best she can do her present title is meaningless and should therefore be changed.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
